title: Franchise value of the New York Knicks ( NBA ) 2003 to 2020
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Franchise value in million U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 18.
Overall Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 4600.0 was reached at Year 2020
Minimum Franchise value in million U.S. dollars about 398.0 was reached at Year 2003
